org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.serializer

Interface Serializer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaSerializer, KryoSerializer

    public interface Serializer
extends Serializable
    Interface which should be implemented by all serializers responsible for writing/loading data to/from Cassandra in binary (BLOB) format.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object deserialize(ByteBuffer buf)
      Deserializes object from byte buffer.
      ByteBuffer serialize(Object obj)
      Serializes object into byte buffer.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        ByteBuffer serialize(Object obj)
        Serializes object into byte buffer.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to serialize.
        Returns:
        Byte buffer with binary data.

      • deserialize

        Object deserialize(ByteBuffer buf)
        Deserializes object from byte buffer.
        Parameters:
        buf - Byte buffer.
        Returns:
        Deserialized object.
